entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
